trans-unit.source: Manages all the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Gere todos os sistemas de entrada no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The InputManager class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A classe de InputManager é responsável por em todos os sistemas de entrada em coordenação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Filters can modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Filtros podem modificar a área de transição de entrada.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um monitor é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Monitores não é possível modificar a área de transição de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The InputManager controls the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: O InputManager controla a área de transição de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: A área de transição de entrada processa entrada em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] eventos.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nas fases siga: 1.

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processar fase.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Pré-notificar fase.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] entrada de evento ou eventos são gerados.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Notificar pós-cópia fase.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Fase de pós-processo.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref> associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref> associada ao thread actual.

trans-unit.source: This class will not be available in Internet zone.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não estarão disponível na zona de Internet.

trans-unit.source: The input manager.
trans-unit.target: O Gestor de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*> method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controlo introduz o modo de menu ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PushMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Componentes a registar os delegados este evento para responder a um controlo de modo de menu do Gestor de entrada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o resultado de um teste de acessos pode ter sido alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of InputProviders registered with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de InputProviders registado com o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of input provides.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de entrada fornece.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref> is in menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"> </xref> está no modo de menu.

trans-unit.source: The IsInMenuMode property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade IsInMenuMode `true` se qualquer menus estão abertos e devolve `false` se nenhum menus estão abertos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref> is in menu mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esta <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"> </xref> está no modo de menu; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*> method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controlo deixa o modo de menu ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PopMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Os componentes a registar os delegados este evento para responder a um controlo que sai de modo de menu do Gestor de entrada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o dispositivo de entrada associado o mais recente evento de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The input device.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Called by components to leave menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelos componentes para deixar o modo de menu.

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to leave the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Um componente chama este método para deixar o modo de menu do Gestor de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages.
trans-unit.target: O `menuSite` versões acesso privilegiado para mensagens de janela.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método faz com que a contagem de menus abertas para diminuir interna e define o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>propriedade `false`, se este for o último menu para fechar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The menu to leave.
trans-unit.target: O menu para sair.

trans-unit.source: menuSite is .
trans-unit.target: menuSiteis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"></xref> handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events have been raised.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput"> </xref> processadores tem concluído a processar a entrada e correspondente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] eventos tem sido gerados.

trans-unit.source: A monitor is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> or PostNotifyInput.
trans-unit.target: Um monitor é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>ou PostNotifyInput.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Monitores não é possível modificar a área de transição de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The handlers attached to PostNotifyInput are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system.
trans-unit.target: Os processadores ligados ao PostNotifyInput são invocados pela ordem inversa, de modo a que os processadores adicionados pelos utilizadores são invocados antes de processadores no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: Entrada é processada em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] nas fases siga: 1.

trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput"> </xref> processadores tem concluído a processar a entrada, se a entrada não foi cancelada.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref> começa a processar o item de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> will cancel the processing of the input.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs>transmitido para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler>irá cancelar o processamento da entrada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the primary keyboard device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o dispositivo primário do teclado.

trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de teclado.

trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de rato.

trans-unit.source: Processes the specified input synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Processa a entrada especificada de forma síncrona.

trans-unit.source: A filter is any code that listens to <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro é qualquer código que escuta <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Monitors cannot modify the input staging area.
trans-unit.target: Monitores não é possível modificar a área de transição de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event.
trans-unit.target: A entrada especificada é processada por todos os filtros e monitores e, finalmente, é distribuída para o elemento adequado como um evento de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: Notificar pós-cópia fase.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: Fase de pós-processo.

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: A Gestor de entrada gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: The input to process.
trans-unit.target: A entrada para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all input events were handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se todos os eventos de entrada foram processados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: input is .
trans-unit.target: inputis .

trans-unit.source: Called by components to enter menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelos componentes introduz o modo de menu.

trans-unit.source: A component calls this method to enter the input manager’s menu mode.
trans-unit.target: Um componente chama este método em modo de menu do Gestor de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages.
trans-unit.target: O `menuSite` obtém acesso privilegiado para mensagens de janela.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A> property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método faz com que a contagem de menus abertas para incrementar interna e define o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>propriedade `true`, se esta for o primeira menu para abrir.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.IsInMenuMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The menu to enter.
trans-unit.target: O menu a introduza.

trans-unit.source: menuSite is .
trans-unit.target: menuSiteis .
